# Welcome to My Portfolio!

Hi, I'm Kelbi Hall. I'm a dedicated college student with a passion for corporate sustainability, seeking an internship opportunity to apply academic knowledge in real world scenarios.From an early age, I have been deeply committed to environmentally conscious initiatives and sustainability communications.

I aspire to make a meaningful impact in the corporate world by leveraging my education, passion, creative and photography skills, to advocate for and implement sustainable practices within the fashion industry.
